title: Look up recycling, compost, and trash pick-up days
body:
Apartments or Condos

If you live in an apartment or condo, do not enter your unit number.

Holidays

Service is postponed by one day during holiday weeks: Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year’s Day, unless the holiday falls on a Sunday.
steps: Type your address, without apartment number, in the box below
Press the search button to view your schedule
(optional) Click to add your schedule to your Google, iCal, or Microsoft calendar or click to print a copy

address.name: Austin Recycle and Reuse Drop-off Center

app.title: Use this form to look up your schedule

related.name: Request a second, free recycling cart for your house
